## SimpleRaycastCollider class

Avatar extension to determine collision using [Raycaster](https://threejs.org/docs/#api/en/core/Raycaster)<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class SimpleRaycastCollider implements AvatarExtension 
```
**Implements:** [AvatarExtension](./three-avatar.avatarextension.md)
